skins.selfIntroduction: Gascogne, Richelieu-class battleship number 4, construction canceled due to wartime conditions. Purpose: engage in battle and destroy Master's enemies.
skins.acquisition: Gascogne activation process complete. Directive assigned: secure liberty and victory for Master. Gascogne commencing active service.
skins.details: Analyzing armaments... Condition: satisfactory. Gascogne is able to execute orders.
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Raise the corners of your lips"... Unable to determine significance of said action.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Analysis complete. Master identified to be in a state of "slacking off." State evaluated as an impediment to productivity.
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Do whatever you want"... Analysis of strategic significance of order deemed impossible.
skins.secretaryIdle4: Discrepancy detected in the frequency of "smiles" recorded between members of the fleet, Gascogne's recollection, and expression identification database.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Body temperature abnormality detected. Requesting thorough physical examination.

skins.shipDescription: Gascogne uniform change complete. Directive assigned: have fun on the beach with Master. Requesting detailed instructions for how to "have fun on the beach."
skins.acquisition: Gascogne uniform change complete. Directive assigned: have fun on the beach with Master. Requesting detailed instructions for how to "have fun on the beach."
skins.login: Welcome back, Master. Gascogne is currently executing routine database definition update of the phrase "doing whatever."
skins.secretaryIdle1: Analyzed and compared wind speeds, temperature, and weather readings with mean values of previously recorded data. Assessment: navigation at sea is unaffected.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Contact with unharmful lifeform detected. Requesting instructions for satisfactory interaction.
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Let's go for a swim" C Instructions received. Need for swim ring detected. ...Assertion that swim ring is "unnecessary" to swim contradicts existing information in database.
skins.secretaryTouch: Unable to determine strategic purpose of Master's gaze.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Master, Gascogne has detected body temperature abnormality during self-diagnosis operation.
